hero.title: Quality

hero.description: I help brands communicate to their audience through creative design, clever strategy, and technology.

about.title: About Me
about.name: Revan
description: I am an enthusiastic Information Technology graduate from Universitas Brawijaya (GPA 3.74) with a strong commitment to self-improvement.

I sit right at the intersection of breaking things (QA) and building them (Vibe Coding). With a background in comprehensive manual & automation testing, I ensure software quality is never an afterthought.
When I'm not hunting bugs or prompting AI, you can find me exploring new tech trends or refining my design eye.

capabilities.title: Quality Assurance
capabilities.description: Comprehensive manual & automation testing to ensure platform stability.

capabilities.title: Automation Testing
capabilities.description: Cypress, Selenium, and Katalon Studio integration for regression testing.

capabilities.title: Vibe Coding
capabilities.description: AI-assisted full-stack development using Next.js and Tailwind.

capabilities.title: Mobile Testing
capabilities.description: Android & iOS testing using Appium and real devices.

projects.title: TerraScan (LASKAR AI)
projects.description: AI-based capstone project for analyzing and visualizing environmental data. Built end-to-end ML workflows.

projects.title: BAZNAS National Platform
projects.description: Spearheaded national rollout testing for 30+ offices. Identified critical bugs and ensured stability.

projects.title: Digital Experiences App
projects.description: Bangkit Academy Capstone. Android app for revolutionizing sustainable tourism. Top 50 National Team.

projects.title: Raion Hackjam App
projects.description: First Place winner in Apps Development category at Raion Hackjam 2022.

header.title: Career Journey
header.subtitle: My professional path, education, and milestones.

experience.description: Spearheaded national application training and rollout across 30+ offices. Identified and tracked critical application issues through systematic testing. Collaborated with Product Owners and developers.
Performed manual testing on web/mobile apps for high-profile clients like Kementerian Ekonomi Kreatif, Pegadaian, and TBIG.
Executed detailed test cases across platform features. Ensured functional, regression, and end-to-end testing coverage.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.heading: Let's create something
contact.description: Whether you have a question, a project idea, or just want to say hi, I'm always open to new opportunities.
